ex3.render

Interface IRenderer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RayTracer

    public interface IRenderer
    Interface for rendering classes that receive string description and return a rendered image

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init(SceneDescriptor sceneDesc, int width, int height, java.io.File path)
      Inits the renderer with scene description and sets the target canvas to size (width X height).
      void renderLine(java.awt.image.BufferedImage canvas, int line)
      Renders the given line to the given canvas.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(SceneDescriptor sceneDesc,
          int width,
          int height,
          java.io.File path)
        Inits the renderer with scene description and sets the target canvas to size (width X height). After init renderLine may be called
        Parameters:
        sceneDesc - Description data structure of the scene
        width - Width of the canvas
        height - Height of the canvas
        path - File path to the location of the scene. Should be used as a basis to load external resources (e.g. background image)

      • renderLine

        void renderLine(java.awt.image.BufferedImage canvas,
                int line)
        Renders the given line to the given canvas. Canvas is of the exact size given to init. This method must be called only after init.
        Parameters:
        canvas - BufferedImage containing the partial image
        line - The line of the image that should be rendered.
